Body:
sender_wallet = Wallet()
from_account_hash = 'FAccH1'
to_account_hash = 'TAccH1'
asset_hash = 'AssetH1'
amount = 100
expected = (
    """{
    "senderAddress": "%s",
    "nonce": 1,
    "expirationTime": 0,
    "actionFee": 0.01,
    "actions": [
        {
            "actionType": "TransferAsset",
            "actionData": {
                "fromAccountHash": "%s",
                "toAccountHash": "%s",
                "assetHash": "%s",
                "amount": %d
            }
        }
    ]
}"""
     % (sender_wallet.address, from_account_hash, to_account_hash,
    asset_hash, amount))
tx = Tx(sender_wallet.address, 1, 0.01, 0)
tx.add_transfer_asset_action(from_account_hash, to_account_hash, asset_hash,
    amount)
actual = tx.to_json()
assert expected == actual
